definitions.definition: The process of making something level.
The process of measuring levels to establish heights and altitudes.
Ellipsis of paradigm leveling , the replacement of irregular forms by regular forms .

main_definition: The process of making something level.
secondary_definitions: ( surveying , archaeology ) The process of measuring levels to establish heights and altitudes.
( linguistics ) Ellipsis of paradigm leveling , the replacement of irregular forms by regular forms .
